workflow.name: Turn any Youtube video into VIRAL shorts
workflow.description:
## For Who?

- Content Creators
- Youtube Automation
- Marketing Team

---

## How it works?

**1 -** Enter the video ID (in Edit Field Node) you want to use as a base to create Short Form videos 
**2 -** Use **yt-transcript-api (self-hosted on docker)** to retrieve the transcript of the video
**3 -** Format the transcript to be usable by an LLM
**4 -** LLM select clips based on specific rules (prompt customizable)
**5 -** Split out the selected Clips and perform a loop for each Clip
**6 -** Use **yt-clip-api (self-hosted on docker)** to edit the video in ready-to-use Short Form videos

---

## What you get?

**üß© Copy-Paste Setup** ‚Äì You‚Äôll get a straightforward, easy-to-follow system with clear instructions, even with minimal technical skills.

**üéõÔ∏è Built-in Customization Guide** ‚Äì The documentation includes a dedicated section to help you easily adjust the system to your own channel, video style, or workflow needs.

**üí¨ Full Personalized Support** ‚Äì I‚Äôll personally help you until the workflow is fully running on your side.

**++System Cost to run++: $0**

**++Time to Setup++: 20-40min (depending on your experience)**

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è PRE-REQUISITES

Before purchasing, please make sure you meet the following requirements:

- The YouTube channel you want to clip includes face-cam + screen recording (like on my videos).
- You have basic knowledge of code (enough to follow simple setup instructions). You can also use AI to help you üòâ

---

üë®‚Äçüíª¬†**More Workflows :** [https://n8n.io/creators/nasser/](https://n8n.io/creators/nasser/)
